Body: I am doing a DIY task for my personal interest where txThings (CoAP library for python Twisted framework) is used to control an IoT device. Here is the github repo. In my sample project
column9: the scripts are hosted to raspberry pi to control a device. I am successfully able to communicate with the sample script server.py from CoAP client. But my requirement is to measure the elapsed time
column10: memory and latency of sever.py when the request will be 10
column11: 100 and 1000. I didn't get any solution to measure performance considering the above situation. This question may seem vague to someone
column12:
I apologize for that since I am a newbie to python. Help is very much needed. Thanks in advance.

"
